instructions: From any screen, touch and hold the Home key. Note: A list of your recently accessed applications and tasks appears. Tap the thumbnail of an application to switch to that window.

Register your E911 address at My T-Mobile. Click the link to go right to your Line Settings page. If you re already logged in, click your name, then click Profile > Line Settings . Turn on Wi-Fi and connect to a network. From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to the ON position. Tap the Wi-Fi network to connect to. If prompted, enter the password. Tap Connect . Turn on Wi-Fi Calling: From any Home screen, tap Apps. Tap Settings . Under NETWORK CONNECTIONS , tap More networks . Tap the Wi-Fi Calling switch to ON . When Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi Calling are both enabled, you are ready to use Wi-Fi Calling.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to the ON position. Tap the Wi-Fi network to connect to. If prompted, enter the password. Tap Connect .

From any Home screen, tap Apps. Tap Settings . Under NETWORK CONNECTIONS , tap More networks . Tap the Wi-Fi Calling switch to ON . When Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi Calling are both enabled, you are ready to use Wi-Fi Calling.

From any Home screen, tap Apps. Tap Settings . Under NETWORK CONNECTIONS , tap More networks . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to the ON position. Tap Wi-Fi Calling . Tap Connection Preferences and select a preference: Wi-Fi Preferred Cellular Network Preferred Never use Cellular Network
